memberdef.name: python_eater
memberdef.initializer:
= "#!/usr/bin/python
" "import sys
" "print 'go'
" "sys.stdout.flush()
" "toread=XXXXXXXXXX
" "read=0
" "while(read < toread):
" " buffersize=toread-read
" " if(buffersize > 4096):
" " buffersize=4096
" " r=len(sys.stdin.read(buffersize))
" " read+=r
" " if(r<=0):
" " print 'error'
" " exit()
" "print 'done'
"

memberdef.name: python_giver
memberdef.initializer:
= "#!/usr/bin/python
" "import sys
" "r=sys.stdin.read(2)
" "towrite=XXXXXXXXXX
" "wrote=0
" "mtu = 32786
" "buf = 'A'*mtu
" "while(wrote < towrite):
" " buffersize=towrite-wrote
" " if(buffersize > mtu):
" " buffersize=mtu
" " if(buffersize == mtu):
" " sys.stdout.write(buf)
" " else:
" " sys.stdout.write('A'*buffersize)
" " wrote+=buffersize
" "sys.stdout.flush()
"
